languages.text: "Наказать забывших приличия гостей недельным лишением водного пайка. Мы разделяем негодование Ордена Молота".
"And these guests who seem to have forgotten their manners will be summarily punished — one week without water rations. We share the indignation of the Order of the Hammer."
languages.original_text: "Наказать забывших приличия гостей недельным лишением водного пайка. Мы разделяем негодование Ордена Молота".

traits.locale_text: "And the guests who have forgotten their manners should be punished for a week without water rations. We share the fury of the Order of the Hammer."
"And the guests who have forgotten their manners should be punished for a week without water rations. We share the fury of the Order of the Hammer."
"And these guests who seem to have forgotten their manners will be summarily punished — one week without water rations. We share the indignation of the Order of the Hammer."
"And these guests who seem to have forgotten their manners will be summarily punished — one week without water rations. We share the indignation of the Order of the Hammer."
"And these guests who seem to have forgotten their manners will be summarily punished — one week without water rations. We share the indignation of the Order of the Hammer."

languages.text: “立即惩罚这些似乎已经忘记礼貌的客人，下令一个星期不给他们水喝。对于他们的行为，我们和重锤修会一样愤慨不已。”
languages.original_text: "And these guests who seem to have forgotten their manners will be summarily punished — one week without water rations. We share the indignation of the Order of the Hammer."

traits.locale_text: “立即惩罚这些似乎已经忘记礼貌的客人，下令一个星期不给他们水喝。对于他们的行为，我们和重锤修会一样愤慨不已。”

languages.text: «Y estos invitados que parecen haber olvidado sus modales serán castigados sumariamente, con una semana sin raciones de agua. Compartimos la indignación de la Orden del Martillo».
languages.original_text: "And these guests who seem to have forgotten their manners will be summarily punished — one week without water rations. We share the indignation of the Order of the Hammer."

traits.locale_text: «Y estos invitados que parecen haber olvidado sus modales serán castigados sumariamente, con una semana sin raciones de agua. Compartimos la indignación de la Orden del Martillo».

languages.text: 「礼節を忘れたと思しき客らは、即座に罰を与えられる...1週間水の配給なしとのね。鉄槌の修道会の憤りを共有するとしよう」
languages.original_text: "And these guests who seem to have forgotten their manners will be summarily punished — one week without water rations. We share the indignation of the Order of the Hammer."

traits.locale_text: 「礼節を忘れたと思しき客らは、即座に罰を与えられる...1週間水の配給なしとのね。鉄槌の修道会の憤りを共有するとしよう」

languages.text: « Et ces invités qui semblent ignorer toute notion de savoir-vivre seront sévèrement punis : une semaine sans rations d'eau. Nous partageons l'indignation de l'Ordre du Marteau. »
languages.original_text: "And these guests who seem to have forgotten their manners will be summarily punished — one week without water rations. We share the indignation of the Order of the Hammer."

traits.locale_text: « Et ces invités qui semblent ignorer toute notion de savoir-vivre seront sévèrement punis : une semaine sans rations d'eau. Nous partageons l'indignation de l'Ordre du Marteau. »

languages.text: "Und diese Gäste, die offenbar ihre Manieren vergessen haben, werden unverzüglich bestraft — eine Woche ohne Wasserrationen. Wir teilen die Entrüstung des Ordens des Hammers."
languages.original_text: "And these guests who seem to have forgotten their manners will be summarily punished — one week without water rations. We share the indignation of the Order of the Hammer."

traits.locale_text: "Und diese Gäste, die offenbar ihre Manieren vergessen haben, werden unverzüglich bestraft — eine Woche ohne Wasserrationen. Wir teilen die Entrüstung des Ordens des Hammers."
